column5: Just noticed on www.resortsforsale.com that Naughty Pines Camp is being rebuilt and is for sale at $860,000 Larry S
[font color=green size=3][b]That will be a pretty tough sale, considering the past reputation.
Hi trailer, Ok, I'm dying to know what is the bad reputation is all about. Thanks Dave

[font color=green size=3][b]The previous owner hit a bunch of the sports shows and gave away "free" certificates. The hook was your stay was free but you had to bring 1 or more paying guests, who paid a double price, the camp wasn't well maintained. Then after the fire (camp burned to the ground)the guy would meet the incoming guests, get payed, send them down the road twenty miles to some other accomadations(poor) and disapear with the money. He apparently had a few freinds in Ear Falls who would give him rave reveiws, when asked for a reference.
That really is Naughty. sorry couldn't resist
I remember getting some sort of coupon about 5 years ago. I called and it seemed kind of fishy so I hung up. This sounds just like that situation. Good Riddence.

As most of us know,the camp burned down.It is now being completly re-built, a great building is up,and cabins are going to be built this year. The price advertised for the whole shot is $860,000 Larry S
